casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Alan Dorns, Appellant. Supreme Court, Appellate Term, Second Department, May 10, 1978 APPEARANCES OF COUNSEL Garner & Kreinces (Gerald J. Garner of counsel), for appellant.

Carl A. Vergari, District Attorney (Gloria M. Dabiri and John R. Dinin of counsel), for respondent.

OPINION OF THE COURT

Memorandum.

Judgment of conviction affirmed.

Defendant’s guilt of harassment was established beyond a *55reasonable doubt (see Penal Law, § 240.25; People v Todaro, 26 NY2d 325, 330). We have also considered the other issues raised upon the appeal and found them lacking in merit.

Concur: Farley, P. J., Glickman and Pittoni, JJ.
